snippet: The Day: For many, sports can be a communal camp fire, a place to gather for assurance that we will be safe. Yet the New York Marathon runners, for some reason, were scorned.
abstract: The Day: For many, sports can be a communal camp fire, a place to gather for assurance that we will be safe. Yet the New York Marathon runners, for some reason, were scorned.

headline.main: Two Sensible Decisions: A Call to Race, Then a Call to Cancel
